parameters: \tgt[3]Ah! I see you and the small one is good and well!
\tgt[a1]Uhm... Borf, I came to ask if you had any gear
\tgt[3]Ah, yes! Your father! What a great man he was!\!
He bought so much of my crap!
\tgt[a1]Y-yes, but we're not really here to buy.\!
We just need some gear to-\.\^
\tgt[3]Gear you say?!\! Then let me craft you some gear!
\tgt[3]All I need is some of those damn ((Thiec)) ores from the mines!
\tgt[a1]Well, we were on our way to the mines anyways, so\.\.\^
\tgt[3]Yahoo! Bring me these and I'll craft the greatest gear you'll ever see!
\tgt[a4]Do you think he can make a bow for me too?
\tgt[3]Haha! I can craft you the greatest bow you'll ever see!
\tgt[3]Wah ha! Ya need weapons or armour?
\tgt[a1]No, I was hoping you knew where \N[2]-\.\.\^
\tgt[3]Well, then you need to speak to the shop keeper!\!

parameters.text: "I should speak to this lunatic after I find \\N[2]..."

parameters: Text = "I should speak to this lunatic after I find \\N[2].…
\tgt[3]It's the Banh family and your cat!
\tgt[a4]Oh, a smith. I wonder if he can make bows.
\tgt[3]Oooooh! Bows!\! Let me make you a bow!
\tgt[a4]I thought you'd make me a bow?
\tgt[3]I see the bloody fella needs his \Effect<SlowSwing>own\Effect<Normal> bow!

parameters.text: "We are not talking to this... thing, unless we have to."

parameters: Text = "We are not talking to this... thing, unless we have…
\tgt[3]Hoho! You people will not go down there.
\tgt[a1]Why don't we talk about gear again!
\tgt[3]\ClassName[1]\|, \ClassName[2]\|, if you want to find your mom...\!
<Center>You feel a primal fear building within you.

parameters.text: "No. I don't want to go down there again."
